@comment: English translation (also used as default translation)

workArea.@comment: The list of the work area available

saveScriptModal.title: Save the script with the following name:

clearScriptModal.title: Are you sure to clear the current script ?

aboutModal.gnikrapShortDescription: Gnikrap is a simple scripting environment for the Lego Mindstrom EV3.

errors.cantRetrieveListOfScriptFiles: Can't retrieve the list of files. [__cansedBy__]
errors.webSocketNotSupported: WebSocket not supported by your Browser. Please try with a recent version of your browser. If not possible, please consider installing Firefox.
errors.ev3ConnectionFailed: EV3 Brick connection failed. Connection will be retried in a few seconds. [__causedBy__]
errors.ev3ConnectionNok: EV3 Brick connection closed by the EV3 brick. Connection will be retried in a few seconds.
errors.cantRunScriptEV3ConnectionNok: Can't execute the script, the connection with the EV3 brick is down
errors.cantStopScriptEV3ConnectionNok: Can't stop the script, the connection with the EV3 brick is down

miscellaneous.@comment: All other text messages that can't be associated to another group
miscellaneous.confirmScriptFileDeletion: Confirm you really want to delete '__filename__' ?
miscellaneous.confirmStopScriptAlreadyRunning: A script is already running, stop the script currently running and start the new script ?

errors.@comment: All the errors/exception that come from the server are here
errors.MESSAGE_FIELD_NOT_FOUND: Can't found field: '__field__' in parameter message
errors.SCRITP_LANGUAGE_NOT_SUPPORTED: Language: '__language__, isn't supported. Try JavaScript instead.
errors.UNKNOWN_ACTION: No processor registered for action name: '__action__'
errors.INVALID_SENSOR_PORT: Sensor port '__port__' isn't valid should be in [S1, S2, S3, S4] or [1, 2, 3, 4]
errors.INVALID_MOTOR_PORT: Motor port '__port__' isn't valid, should be in [A, B, C, D]
errors.INVALID_CHANNEL_VALUE: Invalid channel value: '__channel__', valid values in [1, 2, 3, 4]
errors.INVALID_NOTE: Invalid note: '__note__', should be in [C1-B7, # allowed on C, D, F, G, A] or [Do-Si, # allowed on Do, Re, Fa, Sol, La]
errors.SCRIPT_STOP_FORCED: Script forced to stop, please use "ev3.isRunning()"

messages.@comment: All the coded messages that come from the server are here
